code: import{CHANGE_LAYOUT,CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,CHANGE_TOPBAR_THEME,SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,SHOW_SIDEBAR,CHANGE_PRELOADER,TOGGLE_LEFTMENU}from"./actionTypes";export var changeLayout=function changeLayout(layout){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT,payload:layout};};export var changePreloader=function changePreloader(layout){return{type:CHANGE_PRELOADER,payload:layout};};export var changeLayoutWidth=function changeLayoutWidth(width){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,payload:width};};export var changeSidebarTheme=function changeSidebarTheme(theme){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,payload:theme};};export var changeSidebarType=function changeSidebarType(sidebarType,isMobile){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,payload:{sidebarType:sidebarType,isMobile:isMobile}};};export var changeTopbarTheme=function changeTopbarTheme(topbarTheme){return{type:CHANGE_TOPBAR_THEME,payload:topbarTheme};};export var showRightSidebarAction=function showRightSidebarAction(isopen){return{type:SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:isopen};};export var showSidebar=function showSidebar(isopen){return{type:SHOW_SIDEBAR,payload:isopen};};export var toggleLeftmenu=function toggleLeftmenu(isopen){return{type:TOGGLE_LEFTMENU,payload:isopen};};
